# NSItemProviderPreferredImageSizeKey

**Global Variable**

A key provided to the options dictionary to indicate a preferred image size.

## Declaration

```swift
let NSItemProviderPreferredImageSizeKey: String
```

## Discussion

Use this key only with the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSItemProvider] type coercion policy. Ensure the value is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] object that contains a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGSize] struct specifying the requested size, in points.
title: NSItemProviderPreferredImageSizeKey
